name: Casual Mahjong
description:
A single-player Japanese Riichi Mahjong game. After intense battles with real players, why not enjoy a relaxed and delightful match?

Game Features:
  • Clear and simple UI, supports multiple devices
  • Refreshing visuals with no unnecessary content unrelated to mahjong
  • Various mahjong styles that can be switched at any time to soothe the mind and body
  • Moderately challenging computer players for stress-free gameplay
